message: I am yet to try it , but it looks to be promising , and could bridge the native/hybrid gap
story: Mohamed El-Kholy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: J2ObjC - A Java to iOS Objective-C translation tool and runtime. at Parleys.com
caption: parleys.com
description: J2ObjC is a new build tool that translates Java library source for use with iOS apps. The tool transpiles Java code to Objective-C during the build, as no hand-editing of the generated code is necessary. J2ObjC supports most Java language and runtime features required by client-side application deveâ€¦
